transforms.name: vite:load-fallback
vite:css
transforms.result: .wrapper{margin:0 auto}.subtitle{color:#526488;font-size:42px;font-weight:300;padding-bottom:15px;word-spacing:5px}.inner-title{font-family:Raleway;font-size:22px;font-weight:600;letter-spacing:2px;line-height:1.2em;margin:0;padding-bottom:20px;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase}.header-title{color:#a1a9b0;font-size:40px;font-weight:300;line-height:75px;opacity:0;word-spacing:5px}.links{padding-top:15px}.global-menu__container{bottom:0;height:25rem;left:0;margin:auto;opacity:0;position:absolute;right:0;text-align:center;top:0}.global-menu__container .global-menu__ttl{margin:0 0 10px}.global-menu{background-color:#fcfcfc;bottom:0;display:none;height:100%;left:0;overflow:hidden;position:fixed;right:0;top:0;width:100%;z-index:999}.global-menu--active{display:block}.menu-toggle{cursor:pointer;height:50px;opacity:1;position:fixed;right:7%;right:6vw;text-align:center;top:7%;top:1.5vw;width:50px;z-index:1000}.menu-toggle .menu-hamburger{background-color:#a1a9b0;display:block;height:1px;left:50%;margin:-2px 0 0 -13px;position:absolute;text-indent:-9999px;top:50%;transition:.2s ease-in-out;width:26px}.menu-toggle .menu-hamburger:before{top:-8px}.menu-toggle .menu-hamburger:after,.menu-toggle .menu-hamburger:before{background-color:#a1a9b0;border-radius:2px;content:"";display:block;height:1px;left:0;position:absolute;transition:.2s ease-in-out;width:26px}.menu-toggle .menu-hamburger:after{top:8px}.menu-toggle.menu-active .menu-hamburger{background-color:transparent}.menu-toggle.menu-active .menu-hamburger:before{transform:translateY(8px) translateX(-9px) rotate(135deg);-ms-transform:translateY(8px) translateX(-9px) rotate(135deg);-moz-transform:translateY(8px) translateX(-9px) rotate(135deg);-webkit-transform:translateY(8px) translateX(-9px) rotate(135deg);width:45px}.menu-toggle.menu-active .menu-hamburger:after{transform:translateY(-8px) translateX(-9px) rotate(-135deg);-ms-transform:translateY(-8px) translateX(-9px) rotate(-135deg);-moz-transform:translateY(-8px) translateX(-9px) rotate(-135deg);-webkit-transform:translateY(-8px) translateX(-9px) rotate(-135deg);width:45px}.header-container{left:0;position:fixed;top:0;width:100%;z-index:10}.header-scroll{animation:top-in-basic 1s 0s 1;background-color:#fff;box-shadow:0 0 2px 2px #ccc;height:60px}.work-list li{margin-bottom:1%}.work-list li img{width:100%}.hover1{display:inline-block;position:relative;text-decoration:none}.hover1:after{background:#2196f3;bottom:0;content:"";height:1px;left:0;position:absolute;transition:all .3s ease 0s;width:0}.hover1:hover{cursor:pointer}.hover1:hover:after{width:100%}
